rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a minimalist Scandinavian design featuring neutral colors and natural wood accents. Complies with Vastu principles by aligning the main entrance to the north-east.

Spacious living area combining modern Scandinavian aesthetics with functionality for a bachelor pad lifestyle, featuring modular seating and ample natural light. Vastu principles suggest placing the hearth in the southeast corner.
Modern kitchen with clean lines and functional cabinetry. Uses energy-efficient appliances and natural lighting to align with sustainable design practices.
Dedicated home office designed for productivity, featuring built-in shelves and ergonomic furniture. Placed in the north-west sector to harness positive energy.

Private gym area with modern fitness equipment integrated into a flexible workout space. Designed for convenience while maintaining privacy and noise isolation, located towards the south-east corner per Vastu guidelines.
Full bathroom with Scandinavian-inspired fixtures. Incorporates eco-friendly water-saving faucets and a clear layout that respects privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles.
Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation, ensuring energy efficiency.
Balcony space providing a transition between indoor and outdoor living areas.
